home.title: Hi, I‚Äôm Don Freddy
home.subtitle: I'm a fullstack developer with over 6 years of experience, based in Douala, Cameroon. I specialize in building modern web and mobile applications, mainly using JavaScript, Vue.js, and Node.js.
home.subtitle2: For years, I kept putting off building this website ‚Äî but it's finally here. My little corner of the Internet, where I share tech experiments, thoughts (mostly about tech), and occasionally some quirky experiences. Welcome to my space!
